text: Wherever the masculine pronoun occurs in this chapter it shall be construed to apply to either male or female teachers or employees of the Board of Education.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 31-116.

1973 Ed., § 31-117.

DC CODE § 38-112

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Masculine pronoun to include both male and female.
